hero.title: Your Beautiful Hair! Confident You!
hero.subtitle: Professional hair styling and beauty care in the heart of Oulu. Experience expert care and personalized service that brings out your natural beauty.
hero.bg.alt: Salon interior showing modern styling stations and elegant decor
about.title: About Us
about.intro: We're a dedicated team of hair stylists and beauty professionals committed to making you look and feel your best. With years of experience and continuous education, we bring the latest techniques and trends to our beloved clients.
services.title: Our Services
services.intro: We offer professional hair and beauty services for all occasions. Each service is tailored to your specific needs, and our skilled experts ensure you get the best possible results.
services.haircut.title: Precision Haircut
services.haircut.description: Expert haircuts tailored to your face shape and style preferences. Includes consultation, wash, cut, and styling.
services.coloring.title: Hair Coloring
services.coloring.description: From natural highlights to vibrant fashion colors, our expert colorists create the perfect shade for your desired look.
services.styling.title: Special Event Styling
services.styling.description: Professional hair styling for weddings, parties, and special occasions. Includes consultation and trial styling.
services.treatment.title: Hair Treatment
services.treatment.description: Restorative treatments for damaged hair, including deep conditioning, protein treatments, and scalp care.
services.extensions.title: Hair Extensions
services.extensions.description: High-quality hair extensions applied by certified professionals. Natural-looking results that blend seamlessly.
services.grooming.title: Beard & Facial Grooming
services.grooming.description: Expert beard shaping, trimming, and facial hair grooming services. Includes hot towel treatment and precise detailing for a polished look.
services.list.haircut: Haircuts & Styling, Personalized cuts for women, men, and children.
services.list.coloring: Coloring & Highlights, Expert color matching and balayage.
services.list.treatments: Treatments, Deep-conditioning, keratin, and scalp care.
services.list.makeup: Makeup & Beauty, Event and bridal makeup services.
services.list.nails: Nails & Brows, Manicure, pedicure, and brow shaping.
services.custom: Want a different service not on the list? Let us know!
pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.note: Prices may vary depending on hair length and service details.
gallery.title: Our Work
testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.list.1: Absolutely love my new haircut! The staff were friendly and professional.
testimonials.list.2: Best salon experience in Oulu! Highly recommend for coloring and style.
testimonials.list.3: They really listen and deliver exactly what I wanted. I’ll definitely return!
contact.title: Send a Message
contact.subtitle: Ready for your next look? Get in touch with us today.
contact.form.name: Your Name
contact.altCall: Prefer to call? Click to call
footer.about: We’re a local salon in Oulu offering modern cuts, color, and beauty services since 2018.
pricing.heading: Transparent Service Prices
pricing.intro: We believe in fair and clear pricing for every service. Whether it’s a haircut, coloring, or treatment, you’ll know exactly what to expect.
